mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Artery of Trade, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Nuderscher, Frank (Nuderscher, Frank (American painter, 1880-1959)) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This lunette is one of eight along the west end mezzanine that illustrate Missouri's development and resources. The view here is of the Eads Bridge over the Mississippi at St. Louis, looking from the Illinois side of the river. Traveling up and down the river are steamboats, ferries, tugs, and barges. In the foreground there is railroad. -- http://collections.si.edu [work]
